DOC.brief_summary: Very-low calorie diet relatively safe effective inducing significant weight loss , use selective individual clinical supervision . However , weight loss maintenance long-term remain main challenge , many experience significant weight regain . Several compensatory mechanism activate weight reduction , level energy intake ( increase appetite ) energy expenditure ( reduce energy expenditure ) , increase risk relapse . The main aim study compare effect two multidisciplinary lifestyle intervention weight loss maintenance one year , initial weight loss 8 week very-low calorie diet . Participants allocate ( non-randomly ) either outpatient program obesity unit local hospital , inpatient program consist `` continuous care '' intervention , three intermittent stay ( three-week duration ) rehabilitation center one year period . Moreover , investigator aim assess impact weight loss ( achieve low calorie diet ) weight loss maintenance compensatory mechanism activate weight reduction .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss Maintenance Compensatory Mechanisms Activated With Very-low Calorie Diet
DOC.detailed_description: This study include sub-study ( n=30 ) determine timeline compensatory mechanism ( level energy expenditure appetite control system ) activate progressive weight loss . Additional measurement take day-3 , 5 10 % weight loss , 4 week weight stabilization ( gradually reintroduction food ) .
